name: Sign of the Horns
baseMeaning: Hand gesture with index and pinky extended, associated with rock music.
tldr: Rock on! Used for rock/metal music, being cool, or partying hard.

contextMeanings.meaning: Rock and roll or metal music appreciation.
Being cool, awesome, or having a great time.
Pretending to be hardcore or intense.
Celebrating a win or being excited about something.

platformNotes.note: Common in music content and celebration.
Popular in concert and party content.
Used in gaming wins and hype.

generationalNotes.note: Recognizes as rock and roll sign.

seoTitle: Sign of the Horns Emoji Meaning - What Does  Really Mean?
seoDescription: Learn what the rock horns emoji  really means. Used for rock music, being cool, or celebration. Complete context guide.
